name: laurel
content:
laurel noun [C or U]
(TREE)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small evergreen tree (= one that never loses its leaves) that has shiny leaves and small, black fruit

laurel noun [C or U]
(PRAISE)
laurels [ plural ] formal
praise for a person because of something they have done, usually in sport, the arts, or politics: The actors are very good, but when all is considered the laurels must surely go to the director of the play.
See more
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small evergreen tree that has shiny, dark green leaves and black berries (= small round fruit)
